contextPara: Natural referencing in search engines (SEO) is essential in order to generate organic traffic on a website. It is an important foundation of electronic commerce and a guarantee of long-term commercial success. On the other hand, as we will see throughout the session, it is very difficult to know exactly the “magic recipe”, because today’s search engines are very efficient, adaptive and constantly evolving. Additionally, this universe is filled with rumors, hearsay, and shamans/gurus who have supposedly unraveled the mystery of Google's algorithm (spoiler: there are no shortcuts or magic recipes). This will all be covered in more detail in Chapter 9 of this course, but we will take the opportunity until then to conduct our own in-house experiment.
logs2: Create a sitemap and try to integrate it into the Google Search Console : 2026-01-20

product2: The keyword allowing the site to be indexed. The word mlabdpforlsjhew does not mean anything as such, but will be frequently named throughout the website to improve indexing and possibly SEO performance.
